dict.string: Feel more confident
I’m more likely to become argumentative and aggressive, and be involved in a fight
Drinking helps me forget problems at work or school
I can become depressed
Drinking makes socialising easier
I need my friends to look after me and take me home, spoiling their evening
Alcoholic drinks taste good
I can have a whole days’ worth of calories just from drinks and feel too rubbish the following day to go out and exercise
Drinking makes me feel more romantic
I might have sex with someone who I wouldn’t want to if sober
Drinking helps me think better
My decision making is impaired and I spend far more money than I intended
Drinking helps calm me down when I’m angry
Too much means I can become aggressive and argumentative, and get into fights
Drinking is a nice way to celebrate special occasions
I might have memory lapses and forget the occasion
Drinking gives me more confidence in myself
I say something inappropriate that ends up offending someone
Feel great and have fun
I feel awful (groggy and tired) the following day
